T02D2569:28a-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i n'a ma sangg'i ti ho ma bi dhi sam gra ha ta n'a ma /
T02D2569:28a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod
T02D2569:28a-4: pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bsdus pa zhes bya
T02D2569:28a-5: ba / 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2569:28a-6: de la dang po sngags pa ni //
T02D2569:28a-7: rang lus 'jig kyang gzhan phan brtson //
T02D2569:28a-8: rnyed dang bkur sti la ma chags //
T02D2569:28a-9: sems can don du sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2569:28a-10: dang po sa'i cho ga dang sta gon gyi cho ga byas la /
T02D2569:28b-0: yid du @28b 'ong ba'i sa'i char thig btab la /
T02D2569:28b-1: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su thag bung khru gang ba /
T02D2569:28b-3: kha khyer sor bzhi phyir dor ba /
T02D2569:28b-4: de'i steng du sor bzhi ba'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba /
T02D2569:28b-5: nang du padma dang rdo rjes mtshan pa /
T02D2569:28b-6: byug pa dri zhim po dang /
T02D2569:28b-7: me tog dkar pos brgyan pa /
T02D2569:28b-8: mtshams su rdo rje tse gsum pa dang //
T02D2569:28b-9: ba khyer la ku sha dgram par bya'o //
T02D2569:28b-10: shin tu sar pa'i ras kyis g-yogs par bya'o //
T02D2569:28b-11: de nas mchod rdzas dang sreg rdzas dang /
T02D2569:28b-12: yam shing dang bud shing dang /
T02D2569:28b-13: dgang gzar dang blugs gzar rnams bshams te /
T02D2569:28b-14: mchod rdzas ni g-yon du gzhag //
T02D2569:28b-15: sreg rdzas ni g-yas su gzhag go //
T02D2569:28b-16: de nas khrus dang byug pa byas la stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs dang /
T02D2569:28b-18: srod la padma'i 'dug stangs kyis kha shar du bltas te blos bsgrub par bya ba de dmigs te /
T02D2569:28b-20: de nas lce lag byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2569:28b-21: skad cig ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi h'um mdzad kyi
T02D2569:28b-22: sbyor bas ra ba dang dr'a ba dang bgegs bskrad
T02D2569:28b-23: par bya'o // rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang
T02D2569:28b-24: badzra tsakra bya ba 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2569:28b-25: cad mngon sum lta bur dmigs te /
T02D2569:28b-26: phyag rgya bzhi byas la rang rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyas mchod pa byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2569:28b-27: thun mong gi mchod pa lnga dang /
T02D2569:28b-28: khyad par sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad dang /
T02D2569:28b-29: mchod pa nyi shus kyang yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2569:28b-30: sdom pa gzung ba'i bar du rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D2569:28b-31: de nas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2569:28b-32: de nas bdag nyid kyis rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis sngags //
T02D2569:28b-34: zhes bya bas bgegs bsal bar bya'o //
T02D2569:28b-35: badzra shi kha re ru ta ma ta zhes bya
T02D2569:28b-36: bas rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags kyis bdag dang thab
T02D2569:28b-37: dang rdzas dang mchod pa rnams bsang bar bya'o //
T02D2569:28b-38: de nas bdag nyid 'dod pa'i lhar bskyed de /
T02D2569:28b-39: snying ga'i 'od zer gyis ye shes sems dpa' rang
T02D2569:28b-40: dang 'dra ba mdun du spyan drangs la phyag dang
T02D2569:28b-42: snying ga'i 'od zer gyis bdag nyid gnyis su med
T02D2569:28b-43: par byas te phyag rgya chen po bzhis rgyas btab
T02D2569:28b-44: la dbang bskur ba yang blang ngo //
T02D2569:28b-45: de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyis thab khung mi
T02D2569:28b-46: dmigs par byas la mum las dkar ba dang 'tsher
T02D2569:29a-1: cad dang ldan pa'i shin tu che ba'i thab bskyed do //
T02D2569:29a-2: de yang phyi rol gzhal yas khang rgyan dang ldan pa'i nang du chud pa'o //
T02D2569:29a-3: de yang 'o ma can gyi shing gi bud shing ngam /
T02D2569:29a-4: dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci bas thab bas cung
T02D2569:29a-5: zad dma' ba tsam gyi bud shing brtsigs la rgyun
T02D2569:29a-7: yon bdag dka' thub la dga' ba'i khyim nas blangs pa'i me yam shing gis spar te /
T02D2569:29a-9: badzra dzva la ram zhes me'i snying po yang brjod do /
T02D2569:29a-10: de nas me'i spra brtag ste /
T02D2569:29a-11: dgang gzar dang blugs gzar la rang gi chos kyi yi ger bkod de /
T02D2569:29a-12: aom w'a g'i shva ri mum /
T02D2569:29a-14: shin tu gang ba'i mar gyis dgang blugs dang sreg blugs sbyin no //
T02D2569:29a-15: de nas rtags bzang po mthong ba dang /
T02D2569:29a-16: de nas me thab tu ram sum mdo ris mtshan can la /
T02D2569:29a-18: de'i steng du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2569:29a-20: de'i steng du ram dkar po las me lha zhi ba dung dang ku mu da ltar dkar ba /
T02D2569:29a-21: mig gnyis pa ral ba'i thor tshugs dang bcas pa phyag bzhi pa skyabs sbyin dang /
T02D2569:29a-24: gundhe rnams g-yas dang g-yon na 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2569:29a-25: mchod phyir thogs dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2569:29a-26: rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D2569:29a-27: rin po ches dbu brgyan pa /
T02D2569:29a-28: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'dzag cing shin tu zhi ba'o //
T02D2569:29a-30: sprul pa'i me bde bar byas te /
T02D2569:29a-31: lag pa g-yas skyabs sbyin du bzhag la /
T02D2569:29a-32: mthe bo srin lag gi rtsar g-yab cing /
T02D2569:29a-33: ae hye hi bha ga b'an aagni bha ba aam
T02D2569:29a-34: ku sha dza: snying ga'i 'od zer gyis spyan drangs
T02D2569:29a-36: mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ste /
T02D2569:29a-37: snying ga'i 'od zer gyis gnyis su med par bya'o //
T02D2569:29a-38: de nas phyag rgya bzhis gdab par bya ste /
T02D2569:29a-39: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2569:29a-40: badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya bas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2569:29a-41: de nas rdzas thams cad bsags nas snying ga'i 'od
T02D2569:29a-42: zer dang ye shes kyi bdud rtsis rdzas thams cad
T02D2569:29a-44: dgang gzar dang blugs gzar thogs te /
T02D2569:29a-45: byams pa'i sems kyis aagna ye bha ba che ge
T02D2569:29a-46: mo'i sdig pa sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a
T02D2569:29a-47: ya sh'antim ku ru ye sv'a h'a zhes pas yam
T02D2569:29b-1: mar me la sogs pa zhu ba'i rdzas thams cad ni zhal cung zad gdangs par dbul lo //
T02D2569:29b-2: de nas til dad 'bras chan la sogs pa ni phyag tu'o //
T02D2569:29b-4: dri dang byug pa ni thugs kar ro //
T02D2569:29b-5: ku sha dang d'ur ba'i myu gu ni 'od kyi dkyil du'o //
T02D2569:29b-8: de nas sdig pa sbyar bar 'dod na lag pa
T02D2569:29b-9: g-yon pa'i mthil du til nag po la sdig pa'i
T02D2569:29b-11: 'od zer gyis sdig pa bsdus te /
T02D2569:29b-12: bskul tshig dang bcas pas ji srid bde ba tha mthong gi bar du bsreg par bya'o //
T02D2569:29b-13: nad zhi bar byed pa rnams kyis ni snying ga'i
T02D2569:29b-14: bya nag po la 'od zer bsdus pa'i sbyor ba
T02D2569:29b-16: bskul tshig dang bcas pas bsregs na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2569:29b-17: yang na snying ga'i 'od zer gyis bsreg bya legs par bskul te /
T02D2569:29b-18: de'i 'od zer gyis nad blangs la bdud rtsi'i chus bkrus te bskul tshig dang bcas pas bsreg go //
T02D2569:29b-19: tshe spel ba la sogs pa yang tshul 'di nyid kyis 'grub par bya'o //
T02D2569:29b-20: de nas zhabs bsil phul la bstod de /
T02D2569:29b-21: las dang rjes su mthun pa'i phrin las bcol la /
T02D2569:29b-22: me rang gi gzugs kyis de nyid du bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02D2569:29b-23: de nas las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis thab dang rdzas bsangs te /
T02D2569:29b-24: me tog thab tu bor la de lta bu'i thugs kar padma dang zla ba'i gdan bskyed la /
T02D2569:29b-25: de'i steng du mum dmar skya de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phro 'du dad bcas pa /
T02D2569:29b-26: de yongs su gyur pa las btsun 'jam dpal sku
T02D2569:29b-27: mdog zla ba nya ba lta bu rdo rje'i skyil
T02D2569:29b-29: g-yas ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa //
T02D2569:29b-30: g-yon po ti dang gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2569:29b-31: sangs rgyas lnga yis dbu brgyan pa /
T02D2569:29b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' dang
T02D2569:29b-33: khro bo dang khro mo'i tshigs rnams 'dus shing 'phro
T02D2569:29b-34: ba ste / rdo rje dang rin po che dang padma dang /
T02D2569:29b-35: sna tshogs rdo rje dang snying ga dang /
T02D2569:29b-38: spyi bo rnams su bkod pa'i yum bzhi'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2569:29b-39: manydzu shr'i sa ma ya stvam ham /
T02D2569:29b-41: de nas bdun gyi nam mkha'i phyogs su hr'i: dang aa las zla ba'i gdan bskyed de /
T02D2569:30a-1: gyis ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba'i bar du bya'o //
T02D2569:30a-2: de nas mngon sum dang 'dra bar bltas te /
T02D2569:30a-3: phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te /
T02D2569:30a-4: snying ga'i 'od zer gyis thab kyi gzugs dang gnyis su med par bsre /
T02D2569:30a-5: de nas rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcas te /
T02D2569:30a-6: sa ma ya dza: bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2569:30a-7: de nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02D2569:30a-8: de nas aom w'a g'i shva ri mum manydzu shr'i h'um /
T02D2569:30a-9: sarba p'a bam d'a ha na badzr'a ya che ge mo sh'antim ku ru ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2569:30a-10: zhes bya bas yam shing dang mar la sogs pa thams cad dang cho ga gong mas dbul lo //
T02D2569:30a-11: sdig pa sbyang ba dang nad sbyang pa yang cho ga gong mas so //
T02D2569:30a-12: de nas gzi brjid bskyed pa'i phyir mar gyi sreg blugs sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2569:30a-13: tshul des brgya rtsa la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2569:30a-15: yang dag par mchod pa dang /
T02D2569:30a-17: de nas dge ba bsngo ste /
T02D2569:30a-18: las dang rjes su mthun pa'i smon lam btab ste /
T02D2569:30a-19: aom khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D2569:30a-20: ces pa la sogs pas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol //
T02D2569:30a-21: dam tshig sems dpa' bdag la bsdu'o //
T02D2569:30a-22: de nas rdzas thams cad bsangs te me rang gi gzugs su bsam par byas te /
T02D2569:30a-23: cho ga gong ma nyid kyis sreg blugs lhag ma sbyin no //
T02D2569:30a-24: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa dang /
T02D2569:30a-27: aom ae hye hi zhes gshegs su gsol //
T02D2569:30a-28: dam tshig pa bdag la bsdu'o //
T02D2569:30a-29: aom aa k'a ro mu kham zhes bya ba la sogs pas sreg rdzas kyi lhag ma bsdus te /
T02D2569:30a-30: 'byung po thams cad la gtor ma sbyin no //
T02D2569:30a-31: chog nyams pa dang ma tshang ba kha bskang ba'i phyir yi ge brgya ba brjod par bya'o //
T02D2569:30a-32: sbyin sreg las rnams gsal bsdus pas //
T02D2569:30a-33: bdag gis dge ba gang thob des //
T02D2569:30a-34: ma lus sdug bsngal grol gyur te //
T02D2569:30a-35: 'gro kun 'jam dpal thob par shog / slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa /
T02D2569:30a-36: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i tshul gyi spyod pa bsdus pa las /
T02D2569:30a-37: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i spyin sreg gi cho ga bsdus pa rdzogs so /
T02D2569:30a-39: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang /
